Description: Al Abdullatif Industrial Investment (known as: Al Abdullatif) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since February 2007. Al Abdullatif operates within the Consumer Durables and Apparel sector focusing on Home Furnishings. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Al Abdullatif is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 1981.

Shareholder Name: Majed Bin Abdul Rahman Nasser Al Osailan
